rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0001
rows.name: Traveling by transport plane sure is a lot easier, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0002
rows.name: And you are you saying something like this, despite being young?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0003
rows.name: Heheh[ST:wide ]― Yeah, I know, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0004
rows.name:
I just really love the view of NLA
from the transport plane![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0005
rows.name:
That's true. Reconstruction has only just begun, but
it always looks good no matter when you see it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0006
rows.name: Totally![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0007
rows.name:
I'd love to just enjoy the view, but
we don't really have time, so[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Sorry to rush, but
could you explain the areas, Lin?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0009
rows.name: Yes, leave it to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0010
rows.name: Okay, first up is the area behind us, where we just were.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0011
rows.name:
The place where Doug-san and I were doing the flight test
is the Industrial Area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0012
rows.name: It has food plants, facilities for developing weapons and Dolls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0013
rows.name:
This area has the gate leading out to the west side of the city,
so you'll probably be passing through here often.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0014
rows.name:
By the way, the only places with gates are
the Industrial Area and the BLADE Area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0015
rows.name: Next up is the Commercial Area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0016
rows.name:
As the name suggests, there are cafes, restaurants,
general stores, apparel shops[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0017
rows.name: plus lots of other shops all lined up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0018
rows.name:
It's NLA's only real downtown area.
That's why all kinds of people gather there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Yes, it's very lively.
At night the neon lights shine and it's very beautiful![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0020
rows.name: Next is the Residential Area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0021
rows.name:
It has lots of homes for the people of NLA.
There's a church and a big park, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0022
rows.name:
It might be a good place to visit when you want to read a book quietly
or just need some time to think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0023
rows.name: I sometimes just space out in the park myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0024
rows.name:
And finally, our destination: the BLADE Area!
It's basically the heart of NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0025
rows.name: This area has two levels, an upper layer and a lower layer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0026
rows.name:
The upper layer has the BLADE Home
where we live, plus[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0027
rows.name:
The tower housing the Provisional Government and BLADE HQ
is also on this upper level.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0028
rows.name:
The lower level also has space
for Doll maintenance and repairs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Looks like we're about to arrive
at the BLADE Area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0030
rows.name: Thanks, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0031
rows.name:
We'll save the rest of the explanations for
once we get to the BLADE Home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0032
rows.name:
Thank you for boarding.
We've arrived at the BLADE Area![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0033
rows.name: Right—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0034
rows.name:
First, let's head to the BLADE Home.
After that, I need to report the mission[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0035
rows.name: Everyone will be waiting for the good news, I'm sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0036
rows.name:
Right!
Okay then, let's go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0037
rows.name: The BLADE Home where Elma-san and I live is[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0038
rows.name:
just behind this big building[ST:wide ]―
the BLADE Tower.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0039
rows.name: Just go down the street along the left side of the building.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0040
rows.name:
It's a crowded and busy area, so try not to
get distracted and go the wrong way, okay?[ST:wait ]
